name: The Spooky Update
description:
Welcome back to the safest, most exciting adventures that modern gaming has to offer.

We'll jump back in and go on this journey together, and I'll make sure to keep you constantly entertained.

Looks like we're scheduled for a Halloween update later today, I can't wait to see what they have in store for you!

And as always, be sure to play every game absolutely correctly. There is nothing mysterious or hidden within the games.. we wouldn't want another mishap.
